nodes.text: A light green-skinned male Twi'lek worked as a part supplier on Nar Shaddaa, a moon of the planet Nal Hutta, during the Dark Wars in 3951 BBY. While attempting to deliver a part for a scientist's signal tracking equipment to the third docking pylon on the Nar Shaddaa Docks, he was killed by a cleaning droid within the pylon.

Meetra Surik, a former Jedi Knight, discovered the Twi'lek's corpse when she arrived to pick up the part at the request of the scientist. After searching the supplier's body and not finding the part, Surik was attacked by the same cleaning droid. Surik destroyed the droid and returned to the scientist without the part.

The Twi'lek part supplier appeared in the 2004 role-playing video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords. His appearance consists only of his corpse, which the player can examine during a side quest in the game.
